body_html:
Yup, we will have this fixed in 1.4.0-rc1 (if there is one) and surely in the 1.4.0 release.
(For the record, things should be fine for Linux and Windows. If the problem appears in anything other than 1.4.0-rc0 on OS X, please let us know)

body:
Yup, we will have this fixed in 1.4.0-rc1 (if there is one) and surely in the 1.4.0 release.
(For the record, things should be fine for Linux and Windows. If the problem appears in anything other than 1.4.0-rc0 on OS X, please let us know)
